title: Enhance cyberpunk styling with glowing card-style poster and updated branding

requirements.summary: Transform the Holi Grail poster into a card-style booking component with cyberpunk neon glow effects
acceptanceCriteria: Holi Grail poster is displayed as a prominent card component with defined borders
Card has neon glow effect using CSS box-shadow or border-glow animations
Styling uses the existing cyberpunk color palette (neon green #39FF14 and hot pink #FF69B4)
Card has elevated/raised appearance with proper depth and shadow effects

file_operations.description: Create a new card-style component for the Holi Grail poster featuring the edited image frontend/public/assets/holi-grail-card.png with cyberpunk card styling including elevated shadow effects, neon border glow using box-shadow with #39FF14 and #FF69B4, and a booking CTA button that uses the SwiggyBookingCTA component
Import and render the new HoliGrailCard component between the HeroSection and TeamSection, creating a dedicated section for the Holi Grail event booking
Add CSS keyframe animations for pulsing neon glow effects on card borders and define utility classes for the cyberpunk card elevation with layered shadows

requirements.summary: Relocate the MonkeyWorx logo to the top of the page as the primary branding element with neon glow effects
acceptanceCriteria: MonkeyWorx logo is positioned at the top of the page (in hero section or navigation)
Logo has neon glow effect applied (CSS filter, text-shadow, or drop-shadow)
Logo remains prominent and clearly visible as the primary brand identifier
Glow effect uses colors from the cyberpunk palette (neon green or hot pink)

file_operations.description: Add the MonkeyWorx logo using the edited image frontend/public/assets/monkeyworx-logo-neon.png at the left side of the navigation bar with proper sizing and neon glow CSS filter using drop-shadow with #39FF14
Remove or reduce prominence of the existing MONKEYWORX text branding since the logo now serves as the primary brand identifier in the navigation

requirements.summary: Adapt the Holi Grail poster design to full cyberpunk styling with improved color arrangement and visibility
acceptanceCriteria: Poster maintains dark background consistent with matte black (#000000) theme
All text elements have sufficient contrast and are clearly readable
Color scheme uses neon green and hot pink accents throughout the poster
Layout and typography follow industrial cyberpunk aesthetic with monospaced or industrial fonts

file_operations.description: Ensure the card component uses dark matte black background (#000000), applies neon green (#39FF14) and hot pink (#FF69B4) text accents for event details, and uses industrial/monospaced fonts from the Tailwind config for all text overlays on the poster image

requirements.summary: Fix front page subheading text visibility by improving color contrast
acceptanceCriteria: All subheading text in the hero section is clearly visible
Text color provides sufficient contrast ratio against dark background (WCAG AA minimum)
Neon color accents enhance readability rather than obscure it
No text is hidden or blends into the background

file_operations.description: Update the tagline and subheading text colors to use neon green (#39FF14) or hot pink (#FF69B4) with sufficient opacity and add text-shadow effects to ensure all text has clear contrast against the dark background, meeting WCAG AA standards

requirements.summary: Update the Swiggy Scenes ticket booking link to the new URL
acceptanceCriteria: All Swiggy booking buttons and CTAs link to https://r.swiggy.com/v1/swiggy/scenes/comms/100052615
Links open in a new tab with proper security attributes (rel='noopener noreferrer')
No broken or outdated Swiggy booking links remain in the codebase

file_operations.description: Update the booking URL to https://r.swiggy.com/v1/swiggy/scenes/comms/100052615 and verify that target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer' attributes are present
Verify and update any hardcoded Swiggy booking links in the hero section to use the new URL https://r.swiggy.com/v1/swiggy/scenes/comms/100052615

requirements.summary: Add the Instagram handle @monkeyworxcollective to the footer social media section
acceptanceCriteria: Instagram icon in the footer links to https://instagram.com/monkeyworxcollective
Link opens in a new tab with proper security attributes
Instagram handle is displayed or accessible via hover/tooltip if needed
Icon styling matches existing social media icons in the footer

file_operations.description: Update the Instagram icon link to https://instagram.com/monkeyworxcollective, ensure it opens in a new tab with target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer', and add a title or aria-label attribute with @monkeyworxcollective for accessibility
